waterline.description: Paging waterline; will be populated by the server when requesting a paged list

date.description: The date on which the invoice was issued; must be ISO 8601 format

notes.description: List of notes attached to this invoice

dateCreated.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was first created in the Blaze system

attachedToEntityId.description: The Blaze Id of the entity to which the note is attached. E.g. is this is an invoice note, it will be a Blaze invoice id; if this is an invoice group note this will be the invoice group id.

document.description: A document attached to the note

extension.description: The file extension of the document

dateCreated.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was first created in the Blaze system

connectionTypeCode.description: Identifies the source system of the document

statusText.description: Can contain informative text about the document status, especially for Broken documents

externalId.description: The id of the document provided by the external system

dateModified.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was last modified in the Blaze system

internalUrl.description: Image URL for the document in the internal document store

mimeType.description: The mime type of the document - used internally to resolve HTTP responses

status.description: The status (health) of the document: P = Pending resolution from an external system, K = OK, X = Broken, I = Ignored

dateModified.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was last modified in the Blaze system

dateCreated.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was first created in the Blaze system

code.description: External-facing code, that will never change between systems; usually used to reference the connection type from external calls

dateModified.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was last modified in the Blaze system

ownerId.description: The external system id of the invoice group owner

approximateReturnPercentage.description: Indicates the approximate VAT return for this invoice, as per VATit calculations & fees

regionCode.description: Blaze internal region code - for regions like states and provinces

dateCreated.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was first created in the Blaze system

isPersonalExpense.description: True, if this invoice (or invoice item) is flagged as a personal expense - i.e. not a business expense

statusReason.description: The reason for the current status of the invoice

ownerName.description: The name of the invoice group owner - usually a person's name

exchangeRate.description: The exchange rate applicable to the invoice

date.description: Date for which the exchange rate is required

rate.description: The price of the to currency in terms of 1 unit of the from currency

toCurrencyCode.description: Dragon currency code to which the amount will be converted. This is also known as the counter currency

fromCurrencyCode.description: Dragon currency code of the amount. This is also known as the base currency

statusReasonId.description: The Blaze id of the status reason of the invoice

countryCode.description: ISO 3611 country code where the invoice was issued

dateCreated.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was first created in the Blaze system
Internal field, indicates when the invoice was first created in the Blaze system

dateModified.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was last modified in the Blaze system

externalId.description: Identifier, as defined in an external system

dateModified.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was last modified in the Blaze system

invoiceNumber.description: Number of the Invoice as stated on the invoice

taxPercentage.description: Tax percent or tax rate of the invoice set at the national/federal level [Optional]

regionalTaxPercentage.description: Tax percentage or tax rate of the invoice set at the regional/provincial level [Optional]

code.description: External-facing code, that will never change between systems; usually used to reference the connection type from external calls

dateModified.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was last modified in the Blaze system

dragonId.description: References the expense type id in Dragon - this is usually mapped by system administrators

calculationComments.description: Details of any calculation failures of anomalies

netAmount.description: Net amount of the invoice, before tax [Optional]

externalId.description: External id of an invoice, used to identify artefacts in/by an external system

isLekker.description: The invoice detail is fully resolved

dateModified.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was last modified in the Blaze system

mustCalculate.description: Internal status flag - indicates the invoice VAT return is still to be calculated

paperInvoiceReference.description: Use to provide a reference between an electronic invoice and a pare invoice. Usually a system-provided value that is written onto the invoice.

isInAudit.description: This will be true if audit has been started on this invoice.

doesReceiptExist.description: Set to true if it is know that a paper receipt exists for this invoice

whatHappened.description: Action that was performed on the imported item. This is returned in responses from import operations.

location.description: Information about the location of issue of this invoice. If supplied and an entry matching could not be found in the database the location map will be added provided.

regionCode.description: Blaze internal region code - for regions like states and provinces

dateCreated.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was first created in the Blaze system

countryCode.description: ISO 3611 country code where the invoice was issued

externalId.description: External identification for location. Usually used for mapping free-form locations to country codes

dateModified.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was last modified in the Blaze system

hasCalculationError.description: Indicates the VAt return calculation was unsuccessful

taxAmount.description: Tax charged on the invoice. Specifying this from an external system, can ensure greater accuracy in tax calculations.

currencyCode.description: ISO 4217 currency code for which the invoice was issued

items.description: List of invoice items - for itemised invoices.
